permissions.purpose: Allows Solomon AI to read customer information for business analytics.
Allows Solomon AI to read subscription information for business service management.
Allows Solomon AI to read invoice information for financial tracking.
Allows Solomon AI to read checkout session information for payment processing.
Access current user's email address to identify within Solomon AI Business platform.
Allows reading basic data from connected accounts for business relationship management.
Allows Solomon AI to read webhook information for real-time business updates.
Allows Solomon AI to read event information for business activity monitoring.
Allows storing Solomon AI access tokens in Stripe for secure account integration.
